property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ensures escape attempts are just that - attempts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ampryn Tactician enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's all a game. You shouldn't get too attached to the pieces."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Arise. You have been anointed by the light. Go forth and fight without fear, for you shall be victorious."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Archangel of Tithes is untapped, creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures. As long as Archangel of Tithes is attacking, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aven Battle Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the shadow of the aven falls across the battlefield, hope rises in the hearts of the soldiers.

property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Blessed Spirits.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all heroes die in armor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You were defeated the moment you declared your aggression." - Gideon Jura

property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Four claws, two wings, one beak, no fear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cleric of the Forward Order enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control named Cleric of the Forward Order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: War after war, a healer's enemy is always the same - death itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) Whenever Consul's Lieutenant attacks, if it's renowned, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Enlightened Ascetic enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not reject the gods. I reject their authority, their pettiness, and their arrogance."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. If it's renowned, untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: True faith is letting the blade fall without parry. True cunning is using that moment to strike a deadly blow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create four 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is power in abandon, but far more in control." - Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, if a creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creatures of darkness instinctively hide from the light.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 4 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ethereal touch brings relief. The physical touch brings peace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Heavy Infantry enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Doors, walls, skulls . . . it matters not. All barriers will be broken.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, if Hixus, Prison Warden entered the battlefield this turn, exile that creature until Hixus leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To be a knight, Gideon, is to be the shield for the meek against the cruel."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Up to one target creature an opponent controls attacks Gideon, Battle-Forged during its controller's next turn if able. [+1]: Until your next turn, target creature gains indestructible. Untap that creature. [0]: Until end of turn, Gideon, Battle-Forged becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At end of combat, if Kytheon, Hero of Akros and at least two other creatures attacked this combat, exile Kytheon, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. {2}{W}: Kytheon gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) {W}{W}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kytheon and his irregulars worked outside the law to bring justice to the streets of Akros.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, those creatures also gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seal the gate. This is our fight now."

property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.value: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly." - Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

property.value: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bant's most gallant knights wear my sigil, and for that I am humbled."

property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.value: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.

property.value: "A master of hieromancy can see the advantage in any scenario." - Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

property.value: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is hunted, but not for the kill. The magic within draws others to its presence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each player, you choose from among the permanents that player controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. Then each player sacrifices all other nonland permanents they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spear thrown by Kytheon's own hand was the weapon that felled his friends.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They became a single entity, a phalanx in the Temple of Triumph standing against a host of enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's the favored mount of military commanders as well as anyone with a flair for the dramatic.

property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you are felled by my mace, you shall know it was divine fate."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was in fields of grain, not fields of battle, that the Champion learned to bear the yoke of duty to the gods. She worked the land long before she was called on to defend it. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As Alhammarret, High Arbiter enters the battlefield, each opponent reveals their hand. You choose the name of a nonland card revealed this way. Your opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name (as long as this creature is on the battlefield).

property.value: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

(To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

property.value: Alhammarret rose to his feet, and the full force of his mind hit Jace like a storm front.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. If it's your turn, end the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deep-Sea Terror can't attack unless there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After stripping the sunken ships, it rises to the surface for another helping.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Choose one - • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Disciple of the Ring gets +1/+1 until end of turn. • Tap target creature. • Untap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.

property.value: The sea respects no boundaries, least of all the coast.

property.value: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.value: You may cast Harbinger of the Tides as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) When Harbinger of the Tides enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.value: Attacking creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until your next turn. −3: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. −9: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, target opponent mills five cards."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile Jace, Vryn's Prodigy, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "People's thoughts just come to me. Sometimes I don't know if it's them or me thinking."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where's the fun in an escape if it's not at least a little daring?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Energy surges in Izzet labs are opportunities for experimentation.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Nivix Barrier enters the battlefield, target attacking creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

property.value: "I know what you're thinking," Jace whispered in the mage's mind. "It's not going to work."

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals the top seven cards of their library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the rest into their graveyard. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast up to two instant and/or sorcery spells from among the revealed cards instead of one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.value: Jenrik's tower is served by those who once sought to enter it uninvited.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your flesh is unprepared for my gifts."

property.value: She haunts the streets, wings spread wide, with carrion on her breath and blood in her eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player mills four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born from the slaughter of an entire army, it bears the wrath of a hundred souls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shambling Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once he gets up and going, he will forever shamble on.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drink this, brother. It will bring you rest." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Thornbow Archer attacks, each opponent who doesn't control an Elf loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will not rest until the stench of eyeblights is eradicated from these woods."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target player discards a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all nightmares can be escaped by waking." - Ashiok

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Whenever a creature dealt damage by that creature dies this turn, its controller loses 2 life. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Undead Servant enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Get up. You're not finished yet." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana viewed the attention of the angels as a testament to her power. Even so, they were an annoyance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Proud Alkmenos, who would not bow to Erebos in death, is now bowed by his own hubris for all eternity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Abbot of Keral Keep enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) Whenever Acolyte of the Inferno becomes blocked by a creature, it deals 2 damage to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, sacrifice Call of the Full Moon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh. {T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. −2: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target creature. −7: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the moment before her execution, she realized what it meant to be a pyromancer, to be alive, to be Chandra.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing of nature nor of mortals can stand forever.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you stare at the sun for too long, you'll lose your ability to see clearly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to any target. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, this spell can't be countered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra's gift set her apart and others aflame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Impulse deals 2 damage to target creature. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Fiery Impulse deals 3 damage instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {R}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Ghirapur Aether Grid deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The city of Ghirapur is a living thing, and living things defend themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ghirapur Gearcrafter enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. (A creature with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The metal must be pure. The hand must be steady. The product must be perfect.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) As long as Goblin Glory Chaser is renowned, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.) Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1, has haste, and attacks each combat if able. When enchanted creature dies, you may search your library for a card named Infectious Bloodlust, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Javelin deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The harpies descended without mercy upon Akros, only to find their attack put them within range of the javelineers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Mage-Ring Bully attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be rude, Beleren. We just want to enjoy the view with you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a land card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chief among the tenets of Purphoros is that one must destroy in order to create.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Discard a land card: Molten Vortex deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you can't take the heat . . . well, that's going to be a problem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pia and Kiran Nalaar enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. {2}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Pia and Kiran Nalaar deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, Prickleboar gets +2/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Canyons in the Phoberos badlands are essentially gates to the Underworld." - Mirinthes, Akroan captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ravaging Blaze deals X damage to target creature. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ravaging Blaze also deals X damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In time, not even the fire monks could keep up with Chandra.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, if Scab-Clan Berserker is renowned, Scab-Clan Berserker deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Seismic Elemental enters the battlefield, creatures without flying can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trying to stop it would be foolish. If you feel it coming - run!" - Sergeant Ryda

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She will not be content until hers is the highest head in the sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Subterranean Scout enters the battlefield, target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When things get ugly above ground, goblins resort to alternate routes of passage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thopter Engineer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Artifact creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}: Volcanic Rambler deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It moves through lava with the force of an erupting volcano.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aerial Volley deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drakes can swerve to avoid a single arrow, but they can't dodge the whole sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top X cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, untap those lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Caustic Caterpillar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The rare and beautiful butterflies inspire the design of our thopters. The larvae, however, are a different story entirely." - Kiran Nalaar, Ghirapur inventor

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Conclave Naturalists enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your swords and wards have no power here."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is our land. We will not allow eyeblights to poison its beauty."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Come, my beautiful brothers and sisters. Let us hunt." - Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf daen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I want to help Zendikar. Show me the way." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The essence of nature is change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Haste Gaea's Revenge can't be the target of nongreen spells or abilities from nongreen sources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, put up to two creature cards from among the revealed cards into your hand instead of one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles all cards from their hand and all permanents they own into their library, then draws that many cards. Each player may put any number of land cards from their hand onto the battlefield. Exile The Great Aurora.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The distinction of bearing the gods' banner is nothing compared to the glory of being closer to Nyx.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all spiders need webs to catch their prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) As long as Honored Hierarch is renowned, it has vigilance and "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A single tree does not a forest make. We are stronger when we stand together." - Numa, Joraga chieftain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever a player casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Managorger Hydra.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why does everything the Golgari touch end up sticky?" - Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. −2: Create Ashaya, the Awoken World, a legendary 4/4 green Elemental creature token. −7: Untap up to six target lands. They become 6/6 Elemental creatures. They're still lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nissa, Vastwood Seer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The evil inside the mountain pulsed at Nissa in a shock wave of madness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orchard Spirit can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pick not the rotten fruit, but neither touch the best. Leave those as an offering for our unseen guests." - Radwick, farmer of Gatstaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 6 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put six +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.) Outland Colossus can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing more ill-tempered than a griffin in a web is the spider that must subdue it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {1}{G}: Target creature you control gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their strength is no mere numbers game. An intangible force augments the wolves when they run together.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) {2}{G}: Regenerate Undercity Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.) Whenever a creature you control becomes renowned, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail." - Mulak Ffar, Vastwood Biodiversity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 4 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nissa found that the vines of the marsh could ensnare just as well as forest vines could - maybe even better.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nissa had only the space of a heartbeat to react, her instincts steering her blade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Woodland Bellower enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a nonlegendary green creature card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 green Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Blazing Hellhound deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It tears the flesh from your bones and then swallows the ash with its fiery maw.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control an enchantment, Blood-Cursed Knight gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bloodlust shall not control me, for my oath is my greatest compulsion."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Bounding Krasis enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unpredictable as a storm and destructive as a tidal wave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the first line of defense. You will not encounter the second."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Accustomed to battling before an audience in the arena, Iroas's champions know how to put on a good show.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Possessed Skaab enters the battlefield, return target instant, sorcery, or creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If Possessed Skaab would die, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A stitcher's attempt at a skaab with a soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Reclusive Artificer enters the battlefield, you may have it deal damage to target creature equal to the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the elves, her spear is a compass; to the boggarts, a harbinger of doom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thunder doesn't always mean rain. Sometimes it means ruin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Zendikar Incarnate's power is equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her people angered Zendikar, and they faced the land's wrath. That is why Nissa is the last of the animists." - Numa, Joraga chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Alchemist's Vial enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Alchemist's Vial: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A weapon best suited for those with good aim and steady hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead. If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It contains the totality of Alhammarret's notes, theories, and ponderings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faith can quicken the stones themselves with life." - Writings of Mikaeus

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loyal to a fault, it heeds its master's every command.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The foundries of Kaladesh run like clockwork under the supervision of their formidable overseers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blessed by the gods. Coveted by mortals. Beholden to neither.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Guardian Automaton dies, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wealthy in the city of Ghirapur outfit their lives with grand machines, entrusting even their children to filigree and gears.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The histories speak of two feuding rulers whose deaths were celebrated and whose monuments symbolized the end of their wars. In truth they were peaceful lovers, their story lost to the ages.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hangarback Walker enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Hangarback Walker dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying for each +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker. {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blessings are as numerous as the stars of Nyx.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A true scribe devotes an entire lifetime to the creation of a single volume, a masterpiece as unique as its maker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mage-Ring Responder doesn't untap during your untap step. {7}: Untap Mage-Ring Responder. Whenever Mage-Ring Responder attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Meteorite enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) If a creature would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One orb to guard the body, one to protect the mind, and one to shield the soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Prism Ring enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wear it on your dominant hand and it will follow your lead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {R}. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hope to meet Jaya Ballard someday. I think we'd get along." - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ramroller attacks each combat if able. Ramroller gets +2/+0 as long as you control another artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As unstoppable as it is unsteerable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With each honor he earns, Gideon paves the path to his redemption.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: The blade glows only for Zendikar's chosen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may sacrifice Throwing Knife. If you do, Throwing Knife deals 2 damage to any target. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've broken three swords, eighteen lances, and countless shields, but this little blade has survived every battle, just like I have."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The reverberations course through the warriors' veins, beat with their hearts, and pound with their footfalls as they charge into battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Foundry of the Consuls: Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All around the foundry, automatons unhitched themselves from their mounts and pivoted to face Chandra.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Mage-Ring Network. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Mage-Ring Network: Add {C} for each storage counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even from miles away, I could see our eagles circling. That's when I knew we were needed at home." - Kanlos, Akroan captain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the ‘diplomatic' approach." - Terhold, archmage of Drunau

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Destiny is a flickering path among tangled possibilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Another day. Another avenging angel. Another clump of feathers to toss in the trash." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It saddens me to lose a source of inspiration. This one seemed especially promising." - Ashiok

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability." - Maggath, Sardian elementalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." - Dejara, Giltwood druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The desire for its magic horn inspires such bloodthirsty greed that all who see the unicorn will kill to possess it." - Dionus, elvish archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes violent earthquakes, hurtling boulders, and unseasonable dust storms are wrongly attributed to the Roil.
